channel.title: Survival Horror on My Site - Daniel Macias-Galindo
channel.description: Recent content in Survival Horror on My Site - Daniel Macias-Galindo

item.title: Alan Wake
item.description: In a time after all Resident Evils and Silent Hills evolved into action games (this statement might not be quite true after Resident Evil 7), Alan Wake brings back the suspense and a bit of the action style from Remedy Interactive games like Max Payne to PC. I enjoyed this game a lot as it brought me back to “memory lane” of old survival horror games. What’s it all about?
